attributes.title: AVOID THIS APP AT ALL COSTS
attributes.review: Okay I have no idea about this whole gen z tiktok thing going on. I am genuinely a person who adores and glorifies this Cheeto man. When downloading this app, my phone immediately crashed and started smoking. After my phone didnâ€™t turn on for two days, I called apple and they send me a replacement phone. Come to find out this app was the cause of the whole conundrum. This app stole all my information and sold it to a person in Massachusetts where he is using my identity to buy cantaloupes. I am beyond furious. Avoid this app at all costs.

attributes.title: so disappointed
attributes.review:
I was so excited to buy this app, thinking it would be a live show of everything going on in the white house. But APPARENTLY donald trump wants to make America a reality tv show WITHOUT the actual broadcasting. It was so incredibly disappointing. After noticing i actually MET with donald himself who proceeded to punch my dog and then do the renegade over his corpse. Thank god Trumpy boy is dead now or will be by august 27th. I sincerely hope now that he is or will be dead we can stop being a fascist state that is censoring the media (like tik tok)

attributes.title: Unsafe!!
attributes.review: This app triggered my PTSD. As soon as I opened the Trump 2020 App, I was immediately asked for my phone number from with a picture of an old crusty man in the background. This brought me back to an awful period in my life of sick old men hitting on me. I instantly broke down in tears and then proceeded to experience awful hallucinations of the same old man in the picture destroying our country with his racist, homophobic, cruel, and selfish behavior. This was not an okay experience and you should delete this app immediately because of the harm it has caused me and my family.

attributes.title: Extremely disappointed
attributes.review: in the beginning I was really hopeful for this app. I figured it would be the perfect way to stay up to date with events and poll numbers, however, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang, and although his airbending skills are great, he has a lot to learn before heâ€™s ready to save anyone. But I believe Aang can save the world.

attributes.title: Unnecessary overall
attributes.review: Personally just downloaded the app to see what he had in store for us if he were to be re-elected. On top of taking forever to download the first thing I had to do was put in my phone number which I would have rather had a welcome message as the first thing I see when it is supposed to be an app to help him gain more followers. There were many other things I could comment on but you just have to see for yourself and many of my complaints are most likely personal problems.

attributes.title: Horrendous
attributes.review: I have never been more disappointed with an app, I got this expecting it to be easy to navigate so that I wouldnâ€™t have to call up my grandkids to explain but i still had to take the time out of my day to bother those kids. This app doesnâ€™t give me the information I need, itâ€™s just a bunch of propaganda and pointless fluff to detract from what the citizens of this fine country want to know. I will NEVER be willing to get this app or an app like this again! Itâ€™s an embarrassment on the apple store and needs to be removed.
